title: Episode 6-1 Highlights | Park Sung-hoon Ã— Lee Joo-bin's Fierce Ambition Targeting the Queens Family ğŸ”¥
synopsis: A childhood flashback reveals Hong Ga-in's calculated ambitionâ€”she targeted the Hong family's son from the moment they met. In the present, a bugging device is found in Grandfather's study, and the receiver is discovered in Hyun-woo's room, framing him. As family accusations fly, Hye-in desperately begs: 'Say it isn't true. Say you don't know.' The episode exposes the dark schemes threatening the Queens empire from within.
